price: 13. Sima tozalisaki ye litanga lia (mayi) ya ndembo kati ya ebombelo ya makasi.
arabic: ثُمَّ جَعَلۡنَٰهُ نُطۡفَةٗ فِي قَرَارٖ مَّكِينٖ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: thumma jaʿalnāhu nuṭ'fatan fī qarārin makīnin
